001package imagingbook.pub.regions;
002
003import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
004
005/**
006 * TODO: This is temporary and will change!
007 * @author WB
008 *
009 */
010public enum LabelingMethod {
011        
012        BreadthFirst, 
013        DepthFirst, 
014        Recursive, 
015        RegionAndContours,
016        Sequential;
017        
018        public static RegionLabeling getInstance(LabelingMethod method, ByteProcessor bp) {
019                RegionLabeling segmenter = null;
020                switch (method) {
021                        case BreadthFirst:              segmenter = new BreadthFirstLabeling(bp); break;
022                        case DepthFirst:                segmenter = new DepthFirstLabeling(bp); break;
023                        case Recursive:                 segmenter = new RecursiveLabeling(bp); break; 
024                        case RegionAndContours: segmenter = new RegionContourLabeling(bp); break;
025                        case Sequential:                segmenter = new SequentialLabeling(bp); break;
026                }
027                return segmenter;
028        }
029}
